data.trans: Bản thông báo, sự thông cáo
data.trans_hint: Tiếp viên đã đưa ra thông báo nhắc nhở hành khách rằng đây là chuyến bay không hút thuốc.
data.en_hint: The flight attendant made an announcement reminding the passengers that this was a non-smoking flight.
data.content_game_1: The flight attendant made an announcement reminding the passengers that this was a non-smoking flight.
data.answer_en_hint: The flight attendant made an announcement reminding the passengers that this was a non-smoking flight.

data.trans_hint: Thời gian đến ước tính của chuyến bay là 10:30 sáng.
data.en_hint: The flight's approximate time of arrival is 10.30 a.m.
data.content_game_1: The flight's approximate time of arrival is 10.30 a.m.
data.answer_en_hint: The flight's approximate time of arrival is 10.30 a.m.

data.trans: Có thể nhìn thấy, có thể nhận thấy
data.trans_hint: Ngay khi chiếc máy bay rời đường bay, họ bị vây trong lớp mây mù, cả đất liền lẫn bầu trời đều không nhìn thấy được trong suốt chuyến bay dài một giờ.
data.en_hint: As soon as the plane left the runways, they were enveloped in clouds, and neither ground nor sky visible during the entire one-hour flight.
data.content_game_1: As soon as the plane left the runways, they were enveloped in clouds, and neither ground nor sky visible during the entire one-hour flight.
data.answer_en_hint: As soon as the plane left the runways, they were enveloped in clouds, and neither ground nor sky visible during the entire one-hour flight.

data.trans_hint: Các chi tiết của các chuyến bay hôm nay được hiển thị trên màn hình giám sát.
data.en_hint: The details of today's flights are displayed on the monitor.
data.content_game_1: The details of today's flights are displayed on the monitor.
data.answer_en_hint: The details of today's flights are displayed on the monitor.

data.trans: Đồ uống, thức uống (trừ nước lọc)
data.trans_hint: Tiếp viên đã mời tất cả hành khách một đồ uống lạnh trên chuyến bay.
data.en_hint: The flight attendant offered all passengers a cold beverage on the flight.
data.content_game_1: The flight attendant offered all passengers a cold beverage on the flight.
data.answer_en_hint: The flight attendant offered all passengers a cold beverage on the flight.

data.trans: Quầy làm thủ tục (sân bay), nhận phòng (khách sạn)
data.trans_hint: Hãy đến quầy làm thủ tục ít nhất 2 tiếng trước giờ xuất phát.
data.en_hint: Aim to arrive at check-in at least two hours before departure.
data.content_game_1: Aim to arrive at check-in at least two hours before departure.
data.answer_en_hint: Aim to arrive at check-in at least two hours before departure.

data.trans: Rời khỏi, ra đi, khởi hành
data.trans_hint: Máy bay rời khỏi Amritsar lúc 6:15 tối.
data.en_hint: The flight departed Amritsar at 6.15 p.m.
data.content_game_1: The flight departed Amritsar at 6.15 p.m.
data.answer_en_hint: The flight departed Amritsar at 6.15 p.m.

data.trans: Sự rời khỏi, sự ra đi, sự khởi hành
data.trans_hint: Nếu bạn căn thời gian khởi hành cẩn thận, bạn sẽ có thể tránh được thời điểm giao thông tệ nhất.
data.en_hint: If you time your departure carefully, you should be able to miss the worst of the traffic.
data.content_game_1: If you time your departure carefully, you should be able to miss the worst of the traffic.
data.answer_en_hint: If you time your departure carefully, you should be able to miss the worst of the traffic.

data.trans_hint: Phi hành đoàn phải kiểm tra tài liệu của hành khách trước khi lên máy bay.
data.en_hint: The flight crew must check the passengers' documents before embarkation.
data.content_game_1: The flight crew must check the passengers' documents before embarkation.
data.answer_en_hint: The flight crew must check the passengers' documents before embarkation.

data.trans: Nhận diện, nhận ra, xác định, nhận dạng
data.trans_hint: Hành khách được yêu cầu nhận diện vali của chính họ trước khi chúng được đưa lên máy bay.
data.en_hint: Passengers were asked to identify their own suitcases before they were put on the plane.
data.content_game_1: Passengers were asked to identify their own suitcases before they were put on the plane.
data.answer_en_hint: Passengers were asked to identify their own suitcases before they were put on the plane.

data.trans_hint: Tất cả các chuyến bay hiện tại đang bị hoãn vì trận bão tuyết.
data.en_hint: All flights are currently delayed due to the snow storm.
data.content_game_1: All flights are currently delayed due to the snow storm.
data.answer_en_hint: All flights are currently delayed due to the snow storm.
